geminicodeassist.rules:
- Please keep your responses concise unless asked to elaborate.

- Please avoid recommending a different LLM model if you encounter one in the code. For example, if you encounter `gemini-2.5-pro` referenced in the codebase, leave it alone.

- If you are working on ADK, please do not reference a `@tool` decorator. As of January 2026, no such decorator exists. So if you reference it, the code will break.
